analyzed: ▁hetu du ka ▁ saññojan a go cch ak ādi

original: Hetuṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuṁ ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuṁ oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁hetu ṃ ▁ o gh aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁nahetu ▁no o gh o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuṁ yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuṁ nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Nahetuṁ parāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
